long_description: Comfortable, compact and sturdy, the low-profile REI Camp Stowaway Low Chair folds up fast and is easy to transport, whether to camp or concert. Heavy-duty steel tubes provide reliable support; soft foam armrests add comfort. Mesh fabric dries quickly and won't puddle water when left out in the rain. Powder coating keeps the frame looking nice for years to come. Carry bag with color-coded mesh panel facilitates drying; carry bag measures 8 x 28 in.
short_description: Comfortable, compact and sturdy, the low-profile REI Camp Stowaway Low Chair folds up fast and is easy to transport, whether to camp or concert.
